pages.text: Now that you've started to gear up and design a small fortification, its time to get moving!$(br2)Go explore the world for better resources. New challenges await!

Before you start moving around, it's a good idea to stock up on items like these:$(li1)High quality food$(li1)Tool repair materials, especially for lower tier tools$(li1)Ammunition for projectile weapons$(li1)Healing items$(br2)Keeping a good stock of these items can keep you alive longer.

If you can form alliances with nearby players, your chances of survival increase dramatically. So it might be a good idea to look around for others.$(br2)Of course, it's not $(o)necessary$() to work with others, as you can live a life alone if you wish.
